========
Standing
========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/standing.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/standing

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/oliverwm1/standing.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/oliverwm1/standing

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/standing/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://standing.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Compute wavenumber-frequency spectra and decomposition into standing and travelling components


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://standing.readthedocs.io.
